Module fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Interface iAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImplementAPI
public interface iAPI
Interface for extracting data from the OpenWeatherMap API.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    iAPI.Coordinates
    Class for storing coordinates

    Class for storing current weather data.
    static class 
    iAPI.DailyForecast
    Class for storing daily forecast data.
    static class

    Class for storing hourly forecast data.

  • Field Details

    • API_KEY

      static final String API_KEY
      API key for the OpenWeatherMap API. Add API key here, if you want to test the program
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • lookUpLocation

      iAPI.Coordinates lookUpLocation(String location) throws ImplementAPI.LocationNotFoundException
      Returns coordinates for a location.
      Parameters:
      location - Name of the location for which coordinates should be fetched.
      Returns:
      Coordinates for the location.
      Throws:
      ImplementAPI.LocationNotFoundException - if location not found
      ImplementAPI.LocationNotFoundException

    • getForecast

      List<iAPI.DailyForecast> getForecast(iAPI.Coordinates coordinates) throws ImplementAPI.ForecastNotFoundException
      Returns weather data of next seven days for a location.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates of the location for which forecast should be fetched.
      Returns:
      List of DailyForecast objects.
      Throws:
      ImplementAPI.ForecastNotFoundException - if forecast not found
      ImplementAPI.ForecastNotFoundException

    • getHourlyForecast

      List<iAPI.HourlyForecast> getHourlyForecast(iAPI.Coordinates coordinates) throws ImplementAPI.ForecastNotFoundException
      Returns weather data of next 6 hours for a location.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates of the location for which forecast should be fetched.
      Returns:
      List of HourlyForecast objects.
      Throws:
      ImplementAPI.ForecastNotFoundException - if forecast nto found
      ImplementAPI.ForecastNotFoundException

    • weatherApiCall

      iAPI.CurrentCityWeather weatherApiCall(iAPI.Coordinates coordinates) throws ImplementAPI.WeatherDataNotFoundException
      Returns current weather data for a location
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates of the location for which weather should be fetched.
      Returns:
      CurrentCityWeather object.
      Throws:
      ImplementAPI.WeatherDataNotFoundException - if weatherdata not found
